Detailed Description

Functions for opening the till drawer.

Deprecated:
See ReceiptLib

Function Documentation

setDrawerKick (  ) 

Check whether drawer should open on this transaction

Returns:
  • 1 open drawer
  • 0 do not open

setDrawerKickLater (  ) 

Variant check for when to open cash drawer

Returns:
  • 1 open drawer
  • 0 do not open
Opens on cash transactions, credit card transactions > $25, and stamp sales.

This functionality needs to be more modular and customizable.
